name: Healthy Granola Bar
description: A perfectly portioned, honey-sweetened granola bar perfect for lunches or when you are on the go. One recipe makes 30 mini bars!
preparation: Place a lightly oiled Perfect Petites on Sheet Pan.
Place first five ingredients in a food processor.
Melt remaining ingredients in microwave for 50 seconds on HIGH. Drizzle into food processor.
Pulse mixture until all ingredients are just blended.
Divide mixture evenly between sections of the mold. Press in lightly. Bake for 15 minutes.
When cool to the touch, flip mold onto the Sheet Pan and twist to pop out granola bars.

products.name: Perfect Petites
summary: A versatile non-stick silicone pan that makes baking the cutest bite-sized portions easy and fun! Go beyond baking and use the Perfect Petites to make ice cubes, portion baby food and sauces, and more!

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.
